name: Chris Siebenmann (@cks@mastodon.social)
summary:
Dear Go (1.21): why are you refusing to build this open source program with 'go build -mod=readonly', complaining that go.mod needs updates, when 'go build' works and results in no changes to go.mod or go.sum?

Any interested parties: current git tip of https://github.com/go-delve/delve (in cmd/dlv)
